text: DYSS (pronounced DY-double-S; 999 AM) Super Radyo is a radio station owned and operated by GMA Network subsidiary RGMA (Radio GMA). The station's studio is located at the GMA Skyview Complex, Nivel Hills, Apas, Cebu City, while the transmitter is located at Alumnos, Brgy. Mambaling, Cebu City. DYSS-AM operates Mondays to Saturdays from 3:30 AM to 11:00 PM and on Sundays from 4:30 AM to 9:00 PM.Radio and TV Broadcast Station | Region 7A Love Letter At present, Super Radyo DYSS 999 Cebu is considered as one of the top stations in the AM band in Metro Cebu and Central Visayas.RGMA dominates Cebu radio ==Notable anchors== *Bobby Nalzaro ==References== Category:Super Radyo stations DYSS Category:Radio stations established in 1957
title: DYSS
